name: ABRecord
desc: An abstract class that defines the common properties for all Address Book records.

items.name: init!(addressBook: ABAddressBook!)
items.desc: Initializes a record using the given address book.

items.name: init!()
items.desc: Initializes a record using the shared address book.

items.name: func removeValue(forProperty: String!) -> Bool
items.desc: Removes the value for a given property.

items.name: func setValue(Any!, forProperty: String!) -> Bool
items.desc: Sets the value of a given property for a record.

items.name: func setValue(Any!, forProperty: String!, error: ())
items.desc: Sets the value of a given property for a record, returning error information.

items.name: func value(forProperty: String!) -> Any!
items.desc: Returns the value of a given property for a record.

items.name: func isReadOnly() -> Bool
items.desc: Returns whether a record is read-only.

items.name: var displayName: String!
items.desc: A user-visible string representing the record.

items.name: var uniqueId: String!
items.desc: Returns the unique ID for a record.
